name: Purisaz! Thor’s mighty rescue adventure
description:
Narrative context: 

The player controls the main character: Thor. He has the duty to save his Goat which was stolen by the sly god Loki. To do so, the God of Thunder will have to create his way to the end of the dungeon where Loki is hidden, killing monsters and dodging traps on the road to reach him.

Features: 

  • Pick up and use the attacks of the enemies you defeated!
  • Explore the dungeon full of mythological creatures!
  • Watch out for traps hidden inside the rooms!
  • Study your enemies from the beautiful monsterpedia and find out more about their origins!
  • Complete your rescue adventure and save your GOAT!

DEVELOPED BY:

DIS IS A FINE STUDIOS TEAM (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL MILAN, YEAR 1, 2019/2020)

  • Tommaso Bovio 
  • Lorenzo Longoni
